DESCRIPTION: Effect triggers if you have manually swapped characters this turn.
Switch the active character.
A projected card is played at the start of your next turn at no cost.
Improves the potency of your next #yMagick card.
Magick Attacks and Skills additionally scale their damage and Block with #ySpell #yPower.
Place a card on top of your draw pile.
When you obtain #b10 #yProvidence, #yMagick cards are twice as effective for #b1 turn.
Crumpled creatures take additional damage from #yAttacks this turn.
Jinxed creatures take additional damage from #yAttacks this turn.
#yAscending cards upgrades them and makes them more powerful for this combat.
When you play this card, #yProject a copy of it.
Effect triggers if the last card played matches the specified type.
Effect triggers if Primrose is in front.
Effect triggers if Luna is in front.
#yPrimrose #yAbility - Gain #b1 Block per level when playing an #yAttack.
#yLuna #yAbility - Gain #b1 #ySP per level when playing an #ySkill.
Abilities are upgradeable passive effects.
Removed until end of combat.
Determine the next X cards you will draw. You may add Envisioned cards to your hand at the cost of drawing less cards next turn.
Resonant cards are unplayable Retaining cards that confer an effect while in hand. When their uses hit 0, they are automatically discarded and reset.
Star Shards are Resonant cards which Retain and Exhaust.
Grit is a status card that plays and Exhausts other cards.
Secondary effects are the non-damage and non-Block effects of a card.
Wet creatures provide Block when attacked. Each turn, Wet is halved.
Burning creatures take damage at the start of their turn.
Chilled creatures deal #b20% less damage with Attacks, and take #b20% more damage from Attacks if they are #yWet.
Tangled creatures deal #b10% less damage with Attacks per stack this turn.
Muddy creatures deal less damage with Attacks. Each turn, Mud is halved.
Barbs deal damage to ALL enemies the next time you are attacked.
Ice deals damage back and reduces by #b1 whenever you are attacked.
The next time this creature attempts to #yBlock, it instead loses that much HP.
Any card with the word "Arrow" in its name.
A creature with a Stricture loses HP whenever they attack.
A creature with Ruin loses HP at the start of your next turn.
Whenever this card would Exhaust, add it into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
